entries.content: Error with PrismHighlighter.js path - webview trying to load from ui-controllers/services/ instead of ui-logic/services/. File exists in correct location, imports are using correct relative paths. Likely a VSCode webview cache issue.

Successfully integrated FileIconService into MarkdownFormatter to replace generic emojis with real VSCode icons in file badges. Modified 3 files: MarkdownFormatter.js (added getFileIcon method), main.js (preload icon service), ui-messages-list.css (style iconify-icon elements).

CSP Gotcha: Iconify needs connect-src permissions to fetch icon data from APIs (api.iconify.design, api.unisvg.com, api.simplesvg.com). Added these to base.html CSP to fix "Refused to connect" errors.

Enhanced file type listings in MarkdownFormatter with real VSCode icons from FileIconService + smart contextual emojis (üìä for counts, üìù for docs, ‚öôÔ∏è for config, etc.). Pattern matches "**Python files (.py)**: 114 files - description" and renders with beautiful styling.

Implemented smart contextual icons for tool notifications. ToolIconMapper now detects file operations (uses FileIconService for .js, .json, etc.) and command types (git‚Üígit icon, npm‚Üínpm icon, python‚Üípython icon). Falls back to emojis gracefully. Maintains existing gradient backgrounds.
